1059790.name: Juventus VR - CR7 at Villar Perosa
1059790.description: You aren’t officially a Juventus player until you have featured in a match at Villar Perosa. For Cristiano, thousands of fans streamed in to the picturesque ground to see the Bianconeri’s new signing in action, and of course, score his first goal in his new jersey. Experience the match against Villar Perosa in this video.
1059790.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文
